title: Infinitive of purpose
description: Practice using the to-infinitive to express purpose (answering 'why?').

questions.question: Which sentence correctly uses the infinitive of purpose?

choices: She went to the library to study.
She went to the library for study.
She went to the library studying.
She went to the library for to study.

questions.answer: She went to the library to study.
questions.explanation: We use 'to' + base verb (infinitive) to express purpose: 'to study'.

questions.question: Complete: I called my friend _____ (invite) her to my party.

content.sentence: I called my friend _____ her to my party.

questions.question: Which is correct?

choices: He works hard to earn money.
He works hard for earn money.
He works hard earning money.
He works hard for to earn money.

questions.answer: He works hard to earn money.
questions.explanation: The correct structure is 'to' + verb for purpose.

questions.question: Complete: She studies English _____ (get) a better job.

content.sentence: She studies English _____ a better job.

questions.question: Choose the correct answer: Why do you go to the gym?

choices: To keep fit.
For keep fit.
Keeping fit.
For to keep fit.

questions.explanation: We use 'to' + verb to answer 'why?' questions about purpose.

questions.question: Complete: I use my phone _____ (check) emails.

content.sentence: I use my phone _____ emails.

questions.question: Which answer is correct for: Why did you buy a new laptop?

choices: To work from home.
For work from home.
Working from home.
For to work from home.

questions.explanation: The infinitive of purpose is 'to' + verb: 'to work from home'.

questions.question: Complete: We went to the park _____ (have) a picnic.

content.sentence: We went to the park _____ a picnic.

questions.question: Which is correct?

choices: She left early to catch the bus.
She left early for catch the bus.
She left early catching the bus.
She left early for to catch the bus.

questions.answer: She left early to catch the bus.

questions.question: Complete: He went to the shop _____ (buy) some milk.

content.sentence: He went to the shop _____ some milk.

questions.question: Which sentence uses the infinitive of purpose?

choices: I went to the bank to open an account.
I went to the bank opening an account.
I went to the bank for open an account.
I went to the bank for to open an account.

questions.answer: I went to the bank to open an account.
questions.explanation: The correct structure is 'to' + verb for purpose.

questions.question: Complete: She is learning Spanish _____ (travel) in Spain.

content.sentence: She is learning Spanish _____ in Spain.

questions.question: Choose the correct answer: Why do you read books?

choices: To learn new things.
For learn new things.
Learning new things.
For to learn new things.

questions.question: Complete: I went to the market _____ (buy) vegetables.

content.sentence: I went to the market _____ vegetables.

questions.question: Arrange the words to make a correct answer: 'to / English / learn'
questions.explanation: The correct order is 'to learn English'.

questions.question: Which is correct?

choices: He goes to the gym to exercise.
He goes to the gym for exercise.
He goes to the gym exercising.
He goes to the gym for to exercise.

questions.answer: He goes to the gym to exercise.

questions.question: Complete: She went to the store _____ (buy) a dress.

content.sentence: She went to the store _____ a dress.

questions.question: Which answer is correct for: Why do you use a dictionary?

choices: To find word meanings.
For find word meanings.
Finding word meanings.
For to find word meanings.

questions.question: Complete: He went to the post office _____ (send) a letter.

content.sentence: He went to the post office _____ a letter.

questions.question: Arrange the words to make a correct answer: 'to / see / the doctor'
questions.explanation: The correct order is 'to see the doctor'.

questions.question: Which is correct?

choices: He went to the shop to buy bread.
He went to the shop for buy bread.
He went to the shop buying bread.
He went to the shop for to buy bread.

questions.answer: He went to the shop to buy bread.

questions.question: Complete: She called me _____ (ask) for help.

content.sentence: She called me _____ for help.

questions.question: Choose the correct answer: Why do you use a computer?

choices: To do my homework.
For do my homework.
Doing my homework.
For to do my homework.

questions.question: Complete: I went to the station _____ (meet) my friend.

content.sentence: I went to the station _____ my friend.

questions.question: Arrange the words: 'to / see / a movie'
questions.explanation: The correct order is 'to see a movie'.

questions.question: Which is correct?

choices: He went to the gym to swim.
He went to the gym for swim.
He went to the gym swimming.
He went to the gym for to swim.

questions.answer: He went to the gym to swim.

questions.question: Complete: She visited the museum _____ (learn) about history.

content.sentence: She visited the museum _____ about history.

questions.question: Which answer is correct for: Why do you wake up early?

choices: To go to work.
For go to work.
Going to work.
For to go to work.

questions.question: Complete: He went to the kitchen _____ (make) coffee.

content.sentence: He went to the kitchen _____ coffee.

questions.question: Arrange the words: 'to / buy / some / fruit'
questions.explanation: The correct order is 'to buy some fruit'.

questions.question: Which is correct?

choices: She went to the shop to get some bread.
She went to the shop for get some bread.
She went to the shop getting some bread.
She went to the shop for to get some bread.

questions.answer: She went to the shop to get some bread.

questions.question: Complete: I went to the park _____ (run).

content.sentence: I went to the park _____ .

questions.question: Choose the correct answer: Why do you study English?

choices: To travel abroad.
For travel abroad.
Travelling abroad.
For to travel abroad.

questions.question: Complete: She went to the market _____ (buy) fruit.

content.sentence: She went to the market _____ fruit.

questions.question: Arrange the words: 'to / improve / my / English'
questions.explanation: The correct order is 'to improve my English'.

questions.question: Which is correct?

choices: He went to the post office to send a parcel.
He went to the post office for send a parcel.
He went to the post office sending a parcel.
He went to the post office for to send a parcel.

questions.answer: He went to the post office to send a parcel.

questions.question: Complete: She went to the library _____ (study).

content.sentence: She went to the library _____ .

questions.question: Which answer is correct for: Why do you take notes?

choices: To remember information.
For remember information.
Remembering information.
For to remember information.

questions.question: Complete: He went to the doctor _____ (get) medicine.

content.sentence: He went to the doctor _____ medicine.

questions.question: Arrange the words: 'to / ask / a / question'
questions.explanation: The correct order is 'to ask a question'.

questions.question: Which is correct?

choices: She went to the shop to buy some milk.
She went to the shop for buy some milk.
She went to the shop buying some milk.
She went to the shop for to buy some milk.

questions.answer: She went to the shop to buy some milk.

questions.question: Complete: I went to the cinema _____ (watch) a film.

content.sentence: I went to the cinema _____ a film.

questions.question: Choose the correct answer: Why do you go to the library?

choices: To borrow books.
For borrow books.
Borrowing books.
For to borrow books.

questions.question: Complete: She went to the bakery _____ (buy) bread.

content.sentence: She went to the bakery _____ bread.

questions.question: Arrange the words: 'to / get / some / information'
questions.explanation: The correct order is 'to get some information'.

questions.question: Which is correct?

choices: He went to the airport to catch a flight.
He went to the airport for catch a flight.
He went to the airport catching a flight.
He went to the airport for to catch a flight.

questions.answer: He went to the airport to catch a flight.

choices: To learn.
